SELECT BID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, ACCOUNTID, PCONDITION,PRICE,DEALMETHOD FROM ( SELECT BID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, ACCOUNTID, PCONDITION,PRICE,DEALMETHOD, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BID DESC) AS rNum FROM Board WHERE 1=1 AND BTITLE LIKE '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' ) board WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}
SELECT COUNT(BID) FROM BOARD WHERE BID > 0

SELECT B.BID as bId , B.ACCOUNTID as accountId , B.BTITLE as bTitle , B.PRICE as price , B.BCONTENT as bContent , B.PCONDITION as pCondition , B.DEALMETHOD as dealMethod , B.CREATEDATE as createDate , B.BUYSTATUS as buyStatus , B.VIEWCNT as viewCnt , CONCAT(P.URL, '/' || P.UUIDNAME) as url , C.CATEGORYNAME as cateName , A.NAME AS userName FROM BOARD B RIGHT JOIN PHOTOUPLOAD P ON B.BID = P.BID RIGHT JOIN ACCOUNT A ON A.ACCOUNTID = B.ACCOUNTID RIGHT JOIN CATEGORY C ON B.CATEGORYID = C.CATEGORYID WHERE B.BID = #{bId}
SELECT BOARDSTATID , ACCOUNTID as accId , BID , VIEWED , LATEST_VIEWED_DATE AS latestView FROM BOARD_STATICS WHERE BID = #{bId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, ACCOUNTID, CATEGORYID, DEALMETHOD, PCONDITION, PRICE, CREATEDATE) VALUES(#{bId}, #{bTitle}, #{bContent}, #{accountId}, #{cateId}, #{dealMethod}, #{pCondition}, #{price}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORYID as cateId , CATEGORYNAME as cateName FROM CATEGORY ORDER BY CATEGORYID ASC
